actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent unintended disqualification of trusts as electing small business trusts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of electing small business trust to permit as a beneficiary, in addition to the current permitted beneficiaries, a State, a U.S. possession, or the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent unintended disqualification of trusts as electing small business trusts.
